price: 81. Sin embargo, (quienes rechazan la verdad) dicen lo mismo que decían sus antecesores.
arabic: بَلۡ قَالُواْ مِثۡلَ مَا قَالَ ٱلۡأَوَّلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: bal qālū mith'la mā qāla al-awalūna
